pages.text: $(bold)Purpose:$() Summon Unbound Afrit $(br2)$(thing)Abras' Open Conjure$() is a simplified version of $(thing)Abras' Conjure$(), allowing to summon Afrit without red chalk. Due to the much reduced power of the pentacle, it cannot be used to control Afrit, and it thus can only be used to fight and kill Afrit.
